summary: A married woman and her lover murder her husband and dump his body into a well. After a while, his ghost comes to haunt them while the local gossip grows stronger.
cast: Tatsuya Fuji|Kazuko Yoshiyuki|Takahiro Tamura|Takuzô Kawatani|Akiko Koyama|Taiji Tonoyama|Sumie Sasaki|Eizô Kitamura|Masami Hasegawa|Kenzô Kawarasaki|Akiyoshi Fujiwara|Tatsuya Kimura|Osugi|Kei Satô|Takaaki Sugiura
title: El imperio de la pasión
